DateTime::Locale::ha_NG(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation DateTime::Locale::ha_NG(3)

NAME

DateTime::Locale::ha_NG - Locale data examples for the Hausa Nigeria (ha-NG) locale

DESCRIPTION

This pod file contains examples of the locale data available for the Hausa Nigeria locale.

Days

Wide (format) 

  Litinin
  Talata
  Laraba
  Alhamis
  Jummaʼa
  Asabar
  Lahadi

Abbreviated (format)

  Lit
  Tal
  Lar
  Alh
  Jum
  Asa
  Lah

Narrow (format)

  L
  T
  L
  A
  J
  A
  L

Wide (stand-alone)

  Litinin
  Talata
  Laraba
  Alhamis
  Jummaʼa
  Asabar
  Lahadi

Abbreviated (stand-alone)

  Lit
  Tal
  Lar
  Alh
  Jum
  Asa
  Lah

Narrow (stand-alone)

  L
  T
  L
  A
  J
  A
  L

Months

Wide (format) 

  Janairu
  Faburairu
  Maris
  Afirilu
  Mayu
  Yuni
  Yuli
  Agusta
  Satumba
  Oktoba
  Nuwamba
  Disamba

Abbreviated (format)

  Jan
  Fab
  Mar
  Afi
  May
  Yun
  Yul
  Agu
  Sat
  Okt
  Nuw
  Dis

Narrow (format)

  J
  F
  M
  A
  M
  Y
  Y
  A
  S
  O
  N
  D

Wide (stand-alone)

  Janairu
  Faburairu
  Maris
  Afirilu
  Mayu
  Yuni
  Yuli
  Agusta
  Satumba
  Oktoba
  Nuwamba
  Disamba

  Jan
  Fab
  Mar
  Afi
  May
  Yun
  Yul
  Agu
  Sat
  Okt
  Nuw
  Dis

  J
  F
  M
  A
  M
  Y
  Y
  A
  S
  O
  N

Quarters

Wide (format) 

  Kwata na ɗaya
  Kwata na biyu
  Kwata na uku
  Kwata na huɗu

Abbreviated (format)

  K1
  K2
  K3
  K4

Narrow (format)

  1
  2
  3
  4

Wide (stand-alone)

  Kwata na ɗaya
  Kwata na biyu
  Kwata na uku
  Kwata na huɗu

Abbreviated (stand-alone)

  K1
  K2
  K3
  K4

Narrow (stand-alone)

  1
  2
  3
  4

Eras

Wide (format) 

  Kafin haihuwar annab
  Bayan haihuwar annab

Abbreviated (format)

  K.H
  BHAI

Narrow (format)

  K.H
  BHAI

Date Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Talata 5 Faburairu, 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Jummaʼa 22 Disamba, 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Asabar 15 Satumba, -10

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 Faburairu, 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 Disamba, 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 Satumba, -10

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 Fab, 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 Dis, 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 Sat, -10

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5/2/08
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22/12/95
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15/9/-10

Time Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23 UTC

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23 UTC

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44

Datetime Formats

Full 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Talata 5 Faburairu, 2008 18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Jummaʼa 22 Disamba, 1995 09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Asabar 15 Satumba, -10 04:44:23 UTC

Long

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 Faburairu, 2008 18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 Disamba, 1995 09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 Satumba, -10 04:44:23 UTC

Medium

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 Fab, 2008 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 Dis, 1995 09:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 Sat, -10 04:44:23

Short

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5/2/08 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22/12/95 09:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15/9/-10 04:44

Available Formats

Bh (h B) 

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4 B

Bhm (h:mm B)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44 B

Bhms (h:mm:ss B)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30:30 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 B

E (ccc)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Tal
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Jum
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Asa

EBhm (E h:mm B)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Tal 6:30 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Jum 9:05 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Asa 4:44 B

EBhms (E h:mm:ss B)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Tal 6:30:30 B
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Jum 9:05:02 B
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Asa 4:44:23 B

EHm (E HH:mm)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Tal 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Jum 09:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Asa 04:44

EHms (E HH:mm:ss)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Tal 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Jum 09:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Asa 04:44:23

Ed (E, d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Tal, 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Jum, 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Asa, 15

Ehm (E h:mm a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Tal 6:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Jum 9:05 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Asa 4:44 AM

Ehms (E h:mm:ss a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Tal 6:30:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Jum 9:05:02 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Asa 4:44:23 AM

Gy (G y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = BHAI 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = BHAI 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = K.H -10

GyMMM (G y MMM)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = BHAI 2008 Fab
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = BHAI 1995 Dis
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = K.H -10 Sat

GyMMMEd (G y MMM d, E)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = BHAI 2008 Fab 5, Tal
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = BHAI 1995 Dis 22, Jum
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = K.H -10 Sat 15, Asa

GyMMMd (G y MMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = BHAI 2008 Fab 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = BHAI 1995 Dis 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = K.H -10 Sat 15

H (HH)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04

Hm (HH:mm)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44

Hms (HH:mm:ss)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23

Hmsv (HH:mm:ss v)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05:02 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44:23 UTC

Hmv (HH:mm v)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 18:30 UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 09:05 UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 04:44 UTC

M (L)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9

MEd (E, M/d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Tal, 2/5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Jum, 12/22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Asa, 9/15

MMM (LLL)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Fab
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Dis
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Sat

MMMEd (E, MMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Tal, Fab 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Jum, Dis 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Asa, Sat 15

MMMMEd (E, MMMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Tal, Faburairu 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Jum, Disamba 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Asa, Satumba 15

MMMMW-count-other ('week' W 'of' MMMM)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = week 1 of Faburairu
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = week 3 of Disamba
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = week 2 of Satumba

MMMMd (MMMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Faburairu 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Disamba 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Satumba 15

MMMd (MMM d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Fab 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Dis 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Sat 15

Md (M/d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2/5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12/22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9/15

d (d)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15

h (h a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4 AM

hm (h:mm a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44 AM

hms (h:mm:ss a)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30:30 PM
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 AM
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 AM

hmsv (h:mm:ss a v)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30:30 PM UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05:02 AM UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44:23 AM UTC

hmv (h:mm a v)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 6:30 PM UTC
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 9:05 AM UTC
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 4:44 AM UTC

ms (mm:ss)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 30:30
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 05:02
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 44:23

y (y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10

yM (M/y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2/2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 12/1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 9/-10

yMEd (E, M/d/y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Tal, 2/5/2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Jum, 12/22/1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Asa, 9/15/-10

yMMM (MMM y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Fab 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Dis 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Sat -10

yMMMEd (y MMM d, E)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008 Fab 5, Tal
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995 Dis 22, Jum
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10 Sat 15, Asa

yMMMM (MMMM y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Faburairu 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Disamba 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Satumba -10

yMMMd (d MMM, y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 5 Fab, 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 22 Dis, 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = 15 Sat, -10

yMd (y-MM-dd)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = 2008-02-05
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = 1995-12-22
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = -10-09-15

yQQQ (QQQ y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = K1 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = K4 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = K3 -10

yQQQQ (QQQQ y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = Kwata na ɗaya 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = Kwata na huɗu 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = Kwata na uku -10

yw-count-other ('week' w 'of' Y)

   2008-02-05T18:30:30 = week 6 of 2008
   1995-12-22T09:05:02 = week 51 of 1995
  -0010-09-15T04:44:23 = week 37 of -10

Miscellaneous

Prefers 24 hour time?

Yes

Local first day of the week

1 (Litinin)

SUPPORT

See DateTime::Locale.
